modName: Pretty Animated Potions - Regular Potions 1K Retexture
summary: Retexture for vanilla potions with added animations.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][size=4][b][color=#ff0000][center]This mod is released [font=Tahoma][size=4][b][color=#ff0000]ONLY [/color][/b][/size][/font]on Nexus. If you see it on other pages it's probably stolen. [/center][/color][/b][/size][/font][center][size=4][b][color=#ffff00][size=6]
VERSION 2.0 IS HERE![/size][/color]
- IMPROVED TEXTURES
- IMPROVED MESHES
- DUAL COLOR POTIONS

[/b][/size][youtube]PXyTPjcEY04[/youtube][youtube]qWg8B85cyYg[/youtube][/center][size=3]
This is the second part of [color=#3c78d8][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75492/?]Pretty Potions Mod[/url][/color]. It contains 1K retexture and animations for all vanilla potions. Adds about 150 modified potion models for skill potions, some quest potions, stronger restore potions, and few others. It also correct the weight of all potions.

[size=2][size=3]It's meant for vanilla graphic, but it should work with almost any ENB. Visibility of the animations and intensity of the glow depend on many factors, including:[/size]
- in-game time of the day
- use of any lightening mods
- any light sources
- use of ENB  etc.
[size=3]If you feel the effects are too strong or too weak, you can try to use one of the optional files. With some ENBs animations are
not visible during the night or they are not visible at all.

Each folder, either it is animated or non-animated version, includes Main files (000Main, 001NORMAL and 001THICK GLASS)  and optional files (002 OPTIONALS). Optional folder contains misc files for:
[/size][/size][/size][list]
[*][size=3][size=2][size=3] [u]Dragonborn[/u] - [size=2]no need to use if you want to use CACO patch[/size][/size][/size][/size]
[*][size=2][size=3][u]iNeed mod[/u][/size] - it's not a patch, so it's not required if you use iNeed mod, but if you want to use this plugin, you need iNeed and iNeed Dengerous Diseases installed, because what it does is give unique look for each cure disease potion.[/size]
[/list][size=3][size=2][size=3]It also contains CACO patch that replaces prettypotions.esp (because it alters all potions from prettypotions plugin). CACO patch only covers regular potions (no poisons). A patch for both potions and poisons will be included in merged Pretty Potions and Poisons mod.
[color=#00ff00]
[/color][size=4][b][color=#00ff00]INSTALLATION:[/color]
[/b][/size][/size][/size][/size]Fomod installer is included so you can just install with a mod installer. If it doesn't work, copy files from 000Main file folder to your Skyrim folder. Choose if you want to use normal version or thick glass bottles version and copy file from a folder of your choice (either 001NORMAL or 001THICK GLASS) to Skyrim folder as well. Do the same with optional files you would like to use.

[b][size=4][color=#00ff00]UPDATE:[/color]
[/size][/b][size=4][size=2]If you already use first version of the mod and want to update it to version 2.0, first delete "potions" folder from Data/textures/clutter, so you won't have any loose files. Then just install the new version, overwrite the rest of the files if asked.

[color=#ff0000]version 2.0.1[/color]
- small fix in fomod installer


[/size][/size][size=3]NOT COMPATIBLE with any mods that alter potions in any way.

Thanks to stevenmross1957 for being a test subject. [/size]

I hope you like it. If so, please endorse :)

If you would like to use any part of this mod, please contact me first.


First part [size=3][b][color=#3c78d8]- Pretty Potions Mod[/color][color=#3c78d8] - Poisons:  [/color][/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74748?][size=2]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74748?[/size][/url][/size]
author: dailyplanet
